message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this unique product with you. I believe it has tremendous value and I'm confident you'll be interested. I'm willing to offer it to you for $1200000.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900000. I believe that's a fair price considering the value you've described.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that you're looking for a good deal, but I'm afraid $900000 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I'm now offering the product to you for $1100000.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice. However, I'm still a bit hesitant to go above $950000. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to make sure I'm getting a good deal. Can you consider a price of $975000?

I understand that you're trying to get a good deal, Bob, but I'm still not comfortable going below $1050000. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to make sure I'm getting a fair price. I'm now offering the product to you for $1025000.
